Verses: 1 ezhumbip Pragaasi; Un Olivandhadhu, Karththarudaiya Magimai Unmel Udhiththadhu.
2 idho, Irul Boomiyaiyum, Kaarirul Janangalaiyum Moodum; Aanaalum Unmel Karththar Udhippaar; Avarudaiya Magimai Unmel Kaanappadum.
3 un Velichchaththinidaththukku Jaadhigalum, Udhikkira Un Oliyinidaththukku Raajaakkalum Nadandhuvaruvaargal.
4 sutrilum Un Kangalai Ereduththuppaar; Avargal Ellaarum Egamaaikkoodi Unnidaththirku Varugiraargal; Un Kumaarar Dhooraththilirundhu Vandhu, Un Kumaaraththigal Un Pakkaththile Valarkkappaduvaargal.
5 appozhudhu Nee Adhaik Kandu Odivaruvaai; Un Irudhayam Adhisayappattup Poorikkum; Kadarkaraiyin Thiralaana Koottam Un Vasamaaga Thirumbum, Jaadhigalin Balaththa Senai Unnidaththukku Varum.

6 ottagangalin Eraalamum, Meedhiyaan Eppaa Dhesangalin Vegamaana Ottagangalum Unnai Moodum; Sebaavilullavargal Yaavarum Ponnaiyum Thoobavarkkaththaiyum Konduvandhu, Karththarin Thudhigalaip Prasiththappaduththuvaargal.
7 kedhaarin Aadugalellaam Unnidaththil Serkkappadum; Nebaayoththin Kadaakkal Unnai Seviththu, Angigarikkappattadhaai En Palipeedaththinmel Erum; En Magimaiyin Aalayaththai Magimaippaduththuven.
8 megaththaippolavum Thangal Palaganiththuvaarangalukkuth Theevirikkira Puraakkalaippolavum Parandhuvarugira Ivargal Yaar?

9 theevugal Enakkuk Kaaththirukkum; Avar Unnai Magimaippaduththinaar Endru Un Pillaigalaiyum, Avargalodekooda Avargal Ponnaiyum Avargal Velliyaiyum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Naamaththukkendrum Isravelin Parisuththarukkendrum Dhooraththilirundhu Konduvara, Tharsheesin Kappalgalum Erkanave Enakkuk Kaaththirukkum.
10 anniyarin Puththirar Un Madhilgalaik Katti, Avargaludaiya Raajaakkal Unnai Sevippaargal; En Kadunkobaththinaal Unnai Adiththen; Aanaalum En Kirubaiyinaal Unakku Iranginen.
11 unnidaththukku Jaadhigalin Balaththa Senaiyaik Konduvarumpadikkum, Avargaludaiya Raajaakkalai Azhaiththuvarumpadikkum Un Vaasalgal Iravumpagalum Poottappadaamal Eppozhudhum Thirandhirukkum.
12 unnai Sevikkaadha Jaadhiyum Raajyamum Azhiyum; Andha Jaadhigal Nichchayamaaip Paazhaagum.

13 en Parisuththa Sthaanaththai Singaarikkumpadikku, Leebanonin Magimaiyum, Dhevadhaaru Virutchangalum, Paaimara Virutchangalum, Punnaimarangalunkooda Unnidaththirkuk Konduvarappadum; En Paadhasthaanaththai Magimaippaduththuven.

14 unnai Odukkinavargalin Pillaigalum Kunindhu Unnidaththil Vandhu, Unnai Asattaipannina Yaavarum Un Kaaladiyil Panindhu, Unnaikkarththarudaiya Nagaram Endrum, Israveludaiya Parisuththarin Seeyon Endrum Solvaargal.
15 nee Negizhappattadhum, Kaividappattadhum, Oruvarum Kadandhu Nadavaadhadhumaayirundhaai; Aanaalum Unnai Niththiya Maatchimaiyaagavum, Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaayirukkum Magizhchchiyaagavum Vaippen.
16 nee Jaadhigalin Paalaik Kudiththu, Raajaakkalin Mulaippaalaiyum Undu, Karththaraagiya Naan Ratchagarendrum, Yaakkobin Vallavar Un Meetparendrum Arindhukolvaai.

17 naan Vengalaththukkup Padhilaagap Ponnaiyum, Irumbukkup Padhilaaga Velliyaiyum, Marangalukkup Padhilaaga Vengalaththaiyum, Karkalukkup Padhilaaga Irumbaiyum, Varappanni, Un Kankaanigalai Samaadhaanamullavargalum, Un Thandarkaararai Needhiyullavargalumaakkuven.
18 inik Kodumai Un Dhesaththilum, Azhivum Naasamum Un Ellaigalilum Ketkappadamaattaadhu; Un Madhilgalai Ratchippendrum Unvaasalgalaith Thudhiyendrum Solluvaai.
19 ini Sooriyan Unakkup Pagalile Velichchamaayiraamalum, Sandhiran Than Velichchaththaal Unakkup Pragaasiyaamalum, Karththar Unakku Niththiya Velichchamum, Un Dhevane Unakku Magimaiyumaayiruppaar.
20 un Sooriyan Ini Asthamippadhumillai, Un Sandhiran Maraivadhumillai; Karththare Unakku Niththiya Velichchamaayiruppaar; Un Dhukkanaatkal Mudindhupom.
21 un Janangal Yaavarum Needhimaangalum, Endraikkum Boomiyai Sudhandharikkun Kudigalum, Naan Natta Kilaigalum, Naan Magimaippadumpadi En Karangalin Kiriyaigalumaayiruppaargal.
22 sinnavan Aayiramum, Siriyavan Balaththa Jaadhiyumaavaan; Karththaraagiya Naan Etrakaalaththil Idhaith Theeviramaai Nadappippen.
